name: Talkative - Break the Ice
description:
Talkative - Break the Ice

  • Trying to make friends?
  • In need of a conversation icebreaker?
  • Having a hard time coming up with conversation topics?

Talkative helps you with both, suggesting various questions or dares based on topics of your choice!

Never be without something to say ever again!

Keep the conversation flowing with Talkative!

This app was inspired by the video about loneliness from Kurzgesagt, and is aimed at helping you interact with new people and make friends! Don't know what to say? Try the app out!

Currently in review on the Google Play Store
